remarks: The log-Gamma function is bounded on the region ` U ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2017.)
statement:
lgamgulm.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. NN ) $.
lgamgulm.u $e |- U = { x e. CC | ( ( abs ` x ) <_ R /\ A. k e. NN0 ( 1 / R ) <_ ( abs ` ( x + k ) ) ) } $.
lgamgulm.g $e |- G = ( m e. NN |-> ( z e. U |-> ( ( z x. ( log ` ( ( m + 1 ) / m ) ) ) - ( log ` ( ( z / m ) + 1 ) ) ) ) ) $.
lgambdd $p |- ( ph -> E. r e. RR A. z e. U ( abs ` ( log_G ` z ) ) <_ r ) $.
$d G r $.
$d R k m r x z $.
$d U m r z $.
$d k m x $.
$d m ph r x z $.
